submission_summary.rationale: FedRAMP 20x Phase One submission based on RFC-0006

3pao_summary.assessment_summary: 3PAO reviewed the Key Security Indicator validations, evidence, and continuous monitoring, confirming alignment with FedRAMP Low 20x Phase One pilot expectations.

validations.description: Ensure all employees receive security awareness training

nested_validations.criteria: Do all employees receive security awareness training?

validations.description: Require role-specific training for high risk roles

nested_validations.criteria: Do all employees receive role based access training?
Do all employees receive incident response training?
Do all employees receive insider threat security awareness training?
Do all employees receive secure software development training?
Do all employees receive social engineering security awareness training?

ksi_validations.description: A secure cloud service provider will ensure that all system changes are properly documented and configuration baselines are updated accordingly.

validations.description: Log and monitor system modifications

nested_validations.criteria: Are CloudTrail logs being monitored to track system modifications?
Is AWS Security Hub enabled implemented across the environment?
Are AWS Config rules deployed in every account?

validations.description: Execute changes through redeployment of version controlled immutable resources rather than direct modification wherever possible

nested_validations.criteria: Are change management actions/efforts tracked and documented?
Does SAAS utilize immutable container images?

validations.description: Implement automated testing and validation of changes prior to deployment

nested_validations.criteria: Is an automated application testing report (SSP - Add New Organization) present in S3?

validations.description: Have a documented change management procedure

nested_validations.criteria: Is a documented configuration management procedure in place?

validations.description: Evaluate the risk and potential impact of any change

nested_validations.criteria: Is a Security Impact Analysis (SIA) conducted to assess the risk and potential impact of proposed changes?

ksi_validations.description: A secure cloud service offering will use cloud native architecture and design principles to enforce and enhance the Confidentiality, Integrity and Availability of the system.

validations.description: Configure ALL information resources to limit inbound and outbound traffic

nested_validations.criteria: Do WAFs contain rule rate limiting traffic?
Are network ACLs in use across accounts?
Is a proxy deployed within the environment?

validations.description: Design systems to minimize the attack surface and minimize lateral movement if compromised

nested_validations.criteria: Are security groups in place within the environment?
Do IAM roles and associated policies exist in all accounts?
Is GuardDuty enabled in all AWS accounts?

validations.description: Use logical networking and related capabilities to enforce traffic flow controls

nested_validations.criteria: Are security groups in place within the environment?
Are transit gateways in place with route tables configured?
Are network ACLs in use across accounts?

validations.description: Use immutable infrastructure with strictly defined functionality and privileges by default

nested_validations.criteria: Are containers immutable?
Does the Active Directory group audit return populated results for groups and members?

validations.description: Have denial of service protection

nested_validations.criteria: Do WAFs contain rule rate limiting traffic?
Is GuardDuty enabled in all AWS accounts?
Are Network ACLs and Security Groups in place to enforce traffic control?

validations.description: Design systems for high availability and rapid recovery

nested_validations.criteria: Is the system deployed across multiple Availability Zones and multiple AWS regions?
Are Elastic Load Balancers deployed for high availability?
Are recent snapshots present in the account for data recovery?

validations.description: Use high availability design principles to maximize uptime

nested_validations.criteria: Is there documented guidance showing implementation of cloud-native services based on provider best practices?

validations.description: Enforce multi-factor authentication (MFA) using methods that are difficult to intercept or impersonate (phishing-resistant MFA) for all user authentication

nested_validations.criteria: Is phishing resistant MFA implemented and enforced across all AWS WorkSpaces?
Does SaaS implement and enforce MFA?

validations.description: Use secure passwordless methods for user authentication and authorization when feasible, otherwise enforce strong passwords with MFA

nested_validations.criteria: Passwordless methods in place?
GPO Password policies in place?
Enforce strong passwords?

validations.description: Enforce appropriately secure authentication methods for non-user accounts and services

nested_validations.criteria: API Auth Methods present?
Does API Gateway have any authorizers configured?
Does SAAS ALB and APIGW have a WAF assigned?

validations.description: Use a least-privileged, role and attribute-based, and just-in-time security authorization model for all user and non-user accounts and services

nested_validations.criteria: A Does SaaS leverage short lived JWTs (ID token or access token) and verify on API Gateway with Authorizer?
Does SaaS leverage least-privilege roles
Does SaaS leverage role-based access control (RBAC)?

validations.description: Implement zero trust design principles

nested_validations.criteria: IAM key rotation and RSA enforcement defined

validations.description: Identify all third-party information resources

nested_validations.criteria: Does SaaS have an SBOM?

validations.description: Regularly confirm that services handling federal information **or** are likely to impact the confidentiality, integrity, or availability of federal information are FedRAMP authorized and securely configured

nested_validations.criteria: SaaS has config rule for Federal data tagging?
SaaS has a list of all aws services that are fedramp authorized?
Does SaaS perform CIS/STIG Bench Marks?
Are automated assessments performed on SaaS?

validations.description: Identify and prioritize mitigation of potential supply chain risks

nested_validations.criteria: Does SaaS perform risk assesments?

ksi_validations.description: A secure cloud service offering will monitor, log, and audit all important events, activity, and changes.

validations.description: Operate a Security Information and Event Management (SIEM) or similar system(s) for centralized, tamper-resistent logging of events, activities, and changes

nested_validations.criteria: Does SaaS leverage a centralized SEIM?
Is S3 deletion of .gz files prevented via SCP?
Are changes logged and retrievable from centralized SIEM?

validations.description: Regularly review and audit logs

nested_validations.criteria: Are logs and event data being actively pulled into a SIEM?
Does documentation reference 24X7X365 monitoring?

validations.description: Rapidly detect and remediate or mitigate vulnerabilities

nested_validations.criteria: Are vulnerability automation efforts being logged?
Are vulnerability management detection/remediation/mitigation efforts being tracked?

validations.description: Perform authenticated vulnerability scanning on publicly accessible components

nested_validations.criteria: Are vulnerability scans being tracked and logged?
Are vulnerabilty scanning tools deployed and utilized within the environment?
Are container image scans enabled and running in ECR?

validations.description: Perform Infrastructure as Code (IaC) and configuration scanning

nested_validations.criteria: Is the SonarQube scan report present in S3?
Is the live environment configuration being automatically compared to a known good desired state?

validations.description: Centrally track and prioritize the remediation of identified vulnerabilities

nested_validations.criteria: Are continuous monitoring efforts and actions being ticketed?
Does the deviation request ticket file exist in S3?
Is the Command Center ConMon dashboard being utilized for continuous monitoring?

validations.description: Have an up-to-date information resource inventory or code defining all deployed assets, software, and services

nested_validations.criteria: Is AWS Config enabled in every account?
Is there an IaC repo for the environment?

validations.description: Have policies outlining the security objectives of all information resources

nested_validations.criteria: Are there security policy documents?

validations.description: Maintain a vulnerability disclosure program

nested_validations.criteria: Is there a vulnerability disclosure program?

validations.description: Build security considerations into the Software Development Lifecycle and align with CISA Secure By Design principles

nested_validations.criteria: Are security considerations documented?

validations.description: Document methods used to evaluate information resource implementations

nested_validations.criteria: Are IaC deployments validated?

validations.description: Have a dedicated staff and budget for security with executive support, commensurate with the size, complexity, scope, and risk of the service offering

nested_validations.criteria: Is there a letter of commitment?

validations.description: Document risk management decisions for software supply chain security

nested_validations.criteria: Is there a supply change management policy?

ksi_validations.description: A secure cloud service offering will maintain, test, and execute effective Incident Response Plans for routine incidents such as vulnerability discovery, abnormal activity detection, and exfiltration of data.

validations.description: Define Recovery Time Objectives (RTO) and Recovery Point Objectives (RPO)

nested_validations.criteria: Are there RTO and RPO standards?

validations.description: Develop and maintain a recovery plan that aligns with the defined recovery objectives

nested_validations.criteria: Is there a disaster recovery plan in place?

validations.description: Perform system backups aligned with the RTO and RPO

nested_validations.criteria: Is point in time recovery status enabled?
Are data lifecycle policies in place?

validations.description: Test the capability to recover from incidents and contingencies

nested_validations.criteria: Are there Incident Response tickets?

validations.description: Harden and review network and system configurations

nested_validations.criteria: Does SaaS leverage WAF?

validations.description: Encrypt or otherwise secure network traffic

nested_validations.criteria: Is Fargate FIPS mode enabled in ECS account settings for all accounts?

validations.description: Encrypt all federal and sensitive information at rest

nested_validations.criteria: Do all S3 buckets have server-side encryption by default?

validations.description: Manage configuration centrally

nested_validations.criteria: Does CodeCommit repository "XccelerATOr" exist in the control account?

validations.description: Enforce system and information resource integrity through cryptographic means

nested_validations.criteria: Do all S3 buckets have server-side encryption by default?

validations.description: Use automated key management systems to manage, protect, and regularly rotate digital keys and certificates

nested_validations.criteria: Does SaaS leverage AWS KMS built-in Key rotation

validations.description: Use a consistent, risk-informed approach for applying security patches

nested_validations.criteria: Does SaaS leverage AWS Systems Manager Patch Manager patch baselines

validations.description: Identify all third-party information resources

nested_validations.criteria: Does SaaS have an SBOM?

validations.description: Regularly confirm that services handling federal information **or** are likely to impact the confidentiality, integrity, or availability of federal information are FedRAMP authorized and securely configured

nested_validations.criteria: SaaS has config rule for Federal data tagging?
SaaS has a list of all aws services that are fedramp authorized?
Does SaaS perform CIS/STIG Bench Marks?
Are automated assessments performed on SaaS?

validations.description: Identify and prioritize mitigation of potential supply chain risks

nested_validations.criteria: Does SaaS perform risk assesments?

validations.description: Monitor third party software information resources for upstream vulnerabilities, with contractual notification requirements or active monitoring services

nested_validations.criteria: Does SaaS monitor third party software?
